Reviews.Title: “Location - great, room - small, breakfast - included (toast, cereal), internet pay for and sometimes broken”

Reviews.Content: looks outside funky town cant leave suitcase otherwise walk window nice finishing standard light switches grubby dirty dressing table crack sit fall boom tiny tv expensive internet sometimes stopped main reasons poor rating staff friendly especially cleaners short sensitive type traveler people intending stay length time sleep

Reviews.Title: “Give this hotel a miss.”
Reviews.Author: IguanaSydney
Reviews.Content: travel alot am unduly fussy hotel price window tv air con pretty grubby uninviting didnt bother breakfast checked 2 nights stayed try hotel 1929 road price infinitely clean facilities etc
